Title: Satyarth Prakash
Notes: Swami Dayananda's religious text Satyarth Prakash was banned in some princely states and in Sindh in 1944 and is still banned in Sindh.

Title: Rangila Rasul (1927)
Notes: Currently banned in India, Pakistan, and Bangladesh.

Title: Jinnah of Pakistan (1982)
Notes: Banned in 1984 by the military dictator Zia-ul-Haq's government because of some 'offending passages'. Ban lifted in 1989 by the next democratic government.

Title: The Truth About Muhammad
Notes: On December 20, 2006, the government of Pakistan announced a ban on Spencer's book, citing "objectionable material" as the cause.
